basics.name: Daniel Ilies
basics.label: Software Developer (Python & AI)
basics.summary: Software Developer with over 3 years of professional experience specializing in Python backend development and AI/ML model integration. Proven ability to build and deploy production systems using Python, TensorFlow, Flask, and OpenAI APIs. Experienced in developing AI-driven solutions from concept to deployment. EU citizen, available for remote contract opportunities.

work.name: DevelBox
work.summary: Engineered and deployed Python-based AI solutions, focusing on backend services and machine learning model integration for production environments.
highlights: Developed RoboGPT, an AI agent using Python and OpenAI APIs to enable natural language control in robotics simulations, reducing manual setup by approximately 30%.
Engineered AdCognition, an end-to-end ML ad detection system with a Python/TensorFlow training infrastructure and Flask backend API, achieving over 90% detection accuracy.
Maintained a Linux-based ML pipeline for model training, conversion (TensorFlow.js), and monitoring with TensorBoard.
Collaborated on API integration, performed code reviews, and mentored junior developers.

work.name: CGS Romania
work.summary: Provided customer support while also developing internal tools to enhance team productivity and automate workflows.
highlights: Won 1st place in the company's Innovation Contest for 'Otis', a JavaScript-based tool that automated form-filling and email generation, significantly improving team efficiency.

awards.title: 1st Place Innovation Contest
awards.summary: Awarded for creating 'Otis', an internal automation tool that significantly improved team workflow efficiency.

projects.name: RoboGPT
projects.description: NVIDIA Isaac Sim extension for controlling robots via natural language with LLMs and OpenAI APIs.
highlights: Reduced manual simulation inputs by ~30% through a natural language command interface.
Bridged a Python robotics stack with large language model interfaces via the OpenAI API.

projects.name: AdCognition â€“ End-to-End ML Ad Detection System
projects.description: Production system for real-time ad detection featuring a Python/TensorFlow training stack, Flask services, and a browser-based inference model.
highlights: Built the ML pipeline: Python training -> TFJS model export -> Chrome extension deployment.
Implemented Flask services for model hosting, conversion, and monitoring via TensorBoard.

projects.name: MARS5 TTS Telegram Bot
projects.description: A Telegram bot for voice cloning from audio files using a third-party AI API, demonstrating Python backend development and deployment.
highlights: Integrated CambAI MARS5 API for text-to-speech voice cloning.
Packaged and managed the bot application using Docker.
